docs.text:
AIOpsLab A Holistic Framework to Design, Develop, and Evaluate AI Agents for Enabling Autonomous Clouds M365 Research - AIOps Team  Home  Paper  Code Leaderboard

We showcase the key results on the leaderboard. If you'd like your results to appear, please email us at AIOpsLab@microsoft.com. In the table, AVERAGE represents the average accuracy across all tasks. TIME indicates the average runtime for the agents.

Agent Name Average Detection Localization Diagnosis Mitigation Time Organization Link OpsAgent (GPT-4) 78.75 100 60 83.34 66.67 27.6 AIOpsLab & NKU 🔗 FLASH (GPT-4) 59.27 100 46.15 36.36 54.55 102.57 AIOpsLab 🔗 REACT (GPT-4) 53.15 76.92 53.85 45.45 36.36 44.25 AIOpsLab 🔗 DeepSeek-R1 50.47 78.57 58.33 35 30 343.39 THU 🔗 GPT-4 w Shell 49.74 69.23 61.54 40.9 27.27 30.57 AIOpsLab 🔗 FLASH (Llama3-8b) 33.34 80 20 0 33.34 63.16 THU 🔗 GPT-3.5 w Shell 15.73 23.07 30.77 9.09 0 12.79 AIOpsLab 🔗 REACT (Llama3-8b) 15 60 0 0 0 230.74 THU 🔗 LocaleXpert (Llama3-8b) - - 80 - - 102.08 AIOpsLab & NKU 🔗
